Future features¶

New take ops¶

operators “<+”, “<-“, “<*”, “</”.:

10 >> age;
age >> out;
# 10
age <+ 1;
age >> out;
# 11

OOP¶

object oriented programming features, such as classes and their functions.

Other features¶

Comming soon.
